options.content:
# Links

This shows widgets with absolute and relative links, with and without time. Relative links are tested using
the flowAnimation dashboard, but as dashboard IDs aren't static in provisioning, you have to enter the correct
ID in the flowAnimDashboardID variable for those links to work.

Time is only forwarded (when set) if present in the current url.

The third row shows variable substitutions as defined in the site
and panel config.

The fourth row shows reserved variable substitution.

options.panelConfig:
---

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# YAML Aliases to simplify maintenance

anchorLinks:
  - link: &grafana-home
      url: "https://grafana.com/"
      params: "time"
  - thresholds: &thresholds-slow
      - {color: "green", level: 0}
      - {color: "orange", level: 80}
      - {color: "red", level: 150}
  - thresholds: &thresholds-fast
      - {color: "green", level: 0}
      - {color: "orange", level: 200}
      - {color: "red", level: 600}
  - flowAnimation: &flowanim-slow
      thresholdOffValue: 2
      thresholdLwrValue: 10
      thresholdLwrDurationSecs: 1
      thresholdUprValue: 100
      thresholdUprDurationSecs: 0.1
  - flowAnimation: &flowanim-fast
      thresholdOffValue: 10
      thresholdLwrValue: 100
      thresholdLwrDurationSecs: 1
      thresholdUprValue: 600
      thresholdUprDurationSecs: 0.1

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Panel Config

cellIdPreamble: "cell-"
gradientMode: "hue"
tagConfig:
  condensed: false

linkVariables:
  urlPanelWebsiteBase: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel"
  urlPanelWebsiteSurname: "mchugh"
  demoCellName: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel/tree/main/${cell.name}"

cells: 
  grafana:
    link:
      url: "https://grafana.com/"
      params: "time"
  website:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel"
      params: null
  absFlowAnimWithTime:
    link:
      url: "http://localhost:3000/d/${flowAnimDashboardID}/flow-animation?orgId=1"
      params: "time"
  absFlowAnimNoTime:
    link:
      url: "http://localhost:3000/d/${flowAnimDashboardID}/flow-animation?orgId=1"
      params: null
  relFlowAnimWithTime:
    link:
      url: "d/${flowAnimDashboardID}/flow-animation?orgId=1"
      params: "time"
  relFlowAnimNoTime:
    link:
      url: "/d/${flowAnimDashboardID}/flow-animation?orgId=1"
      params: null
  badLinkWithTime:
    link:
      url: "\\\\< > bad data"
      params: "time"
  badLinkNoTime:
    link:
      url: "\\\\< > bad data"
      params: null
  websiteSiteVariables:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andy${urlSiteWebsiteSurname}/andrewb${urlSiteWebsiteSurname}-flow-panel"
      params: null
  websitePanelVariables:
    link:
      url: "${urlPanelWebsiteBase}/tree/main/src/README.md"
      params: null
  relativeSiteVar:
    link:
      url: "?orgId=1"
      params: null
  badLinkSiteVar:
    link:
      url: "\\\\< > bad link ${animationSiteVar} variable data"
      params: null
  andrew:
    dataRef: "andy"
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/${cell.dataRef}${urlSiteWebsiteSurname}/${cell.name}b${urlSiteWebsiteSurname}-flow-panel"
      params: null
  src:
    link:
      url: "${demoCellName}"
      params: null
  examples:
    link:
      url: "${demoCellName}"
      params: null
  grafanaVariable:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel/tree/main/${grafanaVariable}"
      params: "time"

  #----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  # ClickAction Cells
  A:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["noflow"]
    fillColor: &fill-click
      thresholds:
      - {color: "dark-green", level: 0}
    clickActions:
      grafanaVariables:
        on:
          grafanaVariable: "myValue-${cell.name}"
  B:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["noflow"]
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      highlighterSelection: "noflow"
  C:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["outflow"]
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      grafanaVariables:
        on:
          grafanaVariable: "myValue-${cell.dataRef}"
      highlighterSelection: "outflow"
  D:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["inflow"]
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      grafanaVariables:
        on:
          grafanaVariable: "myValue"
      highlighterSelection: "inflow"
  E:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      grafanaVariables:
        on:
          grafanaVariable: "myValue"
      highlighterSelection: "badselection"
  F:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["inflow"]
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      grafanaVariables:
        on:
          badvariable: "myValue"
      highlighterSelection: "inflow"
  G:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["outflow"]
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      highlighterSelection: "inflow"
  H:
    dataRef: "test-data-small-cos"
    tags: ["inflow"]
    fillColor: *fill-click
    clickActions:
      grafanaVariables:
        on:
          grafanaVariable: "on-myValue"
          secondVar: "on-secondVarValue"
        off:
          grafanaVariable: "off-myValue"
          secondVar: "off-secondVarValue"

options.content:
# Click Actions

This shows rectangular widgets associated with clickActions. clickActions can set
grafana variables and/or adjust the highlighter selection. The text in each box
says what it will do.

# Open in same Tab

These panels show the 'openInSameTab' set at the cell, panel and site levels.

options.panelConfig:
---

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Panel Config

cellIdPreamble: "cell-"

cells: 
  website:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel"
      params: null
      sameTab: true

---

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Panel Config

cellIdPreamble: "cell-"

linkWindow:
  sameTab: true

cells: 
  website:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel"
      params: null

---

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Panel Config

cellIdPreamble: "cell-"

cells: 
  website:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel"
      params: null

list.description: Enter the flow animation dashboard ID (from its URL) here. The ID isn't static so the dashboard needs to be told it so it can test relative links.
list.name: flowAnimDashboardID
